level.heading: New licensee and general public orientation class.
level.text: ABRA shall establish a new licensee orientation class that shall be available to licensees and the public at no charge. The class curriculum shall include the following:
A review of relevant provisions contained in both this title and Title 23 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations;
Noise abatement and sound management; and
How to work proactively with Advisory Neighborhood Commissions, neighborhood and business groups, and residents.
